text:

A coastal town mapped its flood-prone lanes and installed raised walkways for the rainy season. The plan kept markets open and allowed emergency services to navigate safely.

explanation: Answer follows directly from the passage.

text:

text: Choose the grammatically correct sentence (fix: “He is living here since 2010.”)
options_json: ["He has been living here since 2010.","He is living here since 2010.","He  is living here since 2010.","he has been living here since 2010."]

explanation: Correct form: “He has been living here since 2010.”.

text:

D. The park was decorated with lights and banners.

C. Local musicians performed throughout the day.

D. Residents organized weekend cleanups.

C. Birds returned to the area.

All poets are dreamers. Some dreamers are teachers.
Which conclusion follows?
options_json: ["Some poets may be teachers.","All dreamers are poets.","No teacher is a poet.","Some teachers are not dreamers."]

text:
All athletes are disciplined. No undisciplined person is a leader.
Which conclusion follows?
options_json: ["Some leaders are athletes.","All leaders are athletes.","Athletes cannot be leaders.","A disciplined person can be a leader."]
answer: A disciplined person can be a leader.
